origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BankOfCanadaAPI.get_monetary_policy_report', 'description': 'This function provides the latest monetary policy report from the Bank of Canada based on the specified report type and language.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report to retrieve, e.g., latest, historical.'}, {'name': 'language', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The language of the report, e.g., English, French.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The monetary policy report in the specified language.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BankOfCanadaAPI.get_monetary_policy_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'latest', 'language'是'English'.
